content: I will have to send my regrets for this Wednesday's call. I am going to be out of the office.

Neither David nor I can make the call. That means there's no chair unless we can get Wayne. Wed is our only chance to have a call to evaluate the content going to ballot - and to approve the remaining IG proposals, so it would be good to have a meeting. Is it worth reaching out to see if Wayne can attend?
Hi all - FYI: Due to cochair conflicts, we will be starting tomorrow's call at 4:30 pm Eastern instead of 4:00.
